column4: Since I'm already here and you're talking about search engines: I don't completely understand which folders (or even document contents?) are searched when I click 'search' from the main menu or inside a folder - is there a website where I could find some info on that searching tool?
i find that search thing to be 'not very good' try a 'locate' command in the terminal   eg    locate firefox
Well, that's not the way I liked to put it, but actually... yes. I just thought I was too dumb to use it somehow
no, it is in a technical term 'crap'
